title: `publish` communication is hard to decode
body:
Not sure what it is trying to say:

```
% datalad publish -r --to mddatasrc
publish(error): crcns-vim-2 (dataset) [Unknown target sibling 'mddatasrc' for publication]
[INFO   ] Will publish updated git-annex 
[INFO   ] Publishing <Dataset path=/home/data/psyinf/scratch/aggdemo/openfmri/ds000002> to mddatasrc 
[ERROR  ] failed to push to mddatasrc: git-annex -> mddatasrc/git-annex [rejected] (fetch first); pushed: ['[up to date]'] [publish(/home/data/psyinf/scratch/aggdemo/openfmri/ds000002)] 
publish(error): openfmri/ds000002 (dataset) [failed to push to mddatasrc: git-annex -> mddatasrc/git-annex [rejected] (fetch first); pushed: ['[up to date]']]
[INFO   ] Will publish updated git-annex 
[INFO   ] Publishing <Dataset path=/home/data/psyinf/scratch/aggdemo/openfmri/ds000001> to mddatasrc 
[ERROR  ] failed to push to mddatasrc: git-annex -> mddatasrc/git-annex [rejected] (fetch first); pushed: ['[up to date]'] [publish(/home/data/psyinf/scratch/aggdemo/openfmri/ds000001)] 
publish(error): openfmri/ds000001 (dataset) [failed to push to mddatasrc: git-annex -> mddatasrc/git-annex [rejected] (fetch first); pushed: ['[up to date]']]
[INFO   ] Will publish updated git-annex 
[INFO   ] Publishing <Dataset path=/home/data/psyinf/scratch/aggdemo/openfmri> to mddatasrc 
[ERROR  ] failed to push to mddatasrc: git-annex -> mddatasrc/git-annex [rejected] (fetch first); pushed: ['[up to date]'] [publish(/home/data/psyinf/scratch/aggdemo/openfmri)] 
publish(error): openfmri (dataset) [failed to push to mddatasrc: git-annex -> mddatasrc/git-annex [rejected] (fetch first); pushed: ['[up to date]']]
publish(notneeded): . (dataset)
action summary:
  publish (error: 4, notneeded: 1)
```

This is immediately after running `update`.
